des:
With the Mi-Light Cloud skill and Alexa,you can interact with your lights and switches by voice now .To get started,select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa APP to link your Mi-Light Cloud account and discover your device(s).

In order to start:
1. Download Mi-Light Cloud App from Apple app store or Google play.
2.You need to create an Account and setup the devices.
3.Rename your device(s), for example: bedroom.
4.Link Alexa Smart Skill with your account.

After setup account and link with Alexa, please get Alexa’s attention by simply saying. 
For example:
"Alexa, discover devices"
"Alexa, turn off bedroom light"
"Alexa, turn on bedroom light"
"Alexa, set bedroom light to 80 percent"
